commandDescription: Preview Lightning Web Components in a virtual mobile environment
targetFlagDescription: Specify name of target simulator or emulator.
targetAppFlagDescription: Identifies the target app. Defaults to the browser app.
configHelpFlagDescription: Displays the format of the preview config file.
configFileFlagDescription: Extended configuration options for preview. Note: this is required for previewing against a mobile app, as apps require extended configuration.
projectDirFlagDescription: Path to the root of the component project. Defaults to the current working directory.
ignoringConfigFileFlagDescription: Configuration file will be ignored when target app is browser.
error:invalidConfigFile:missingAppConfig: No configuration found for %s for platform %s
